landing.sub-first: Tired of struggling with technical errors on your own?
landing.sub-second: Our error ticket management system is here to help!

onboarding.company: Choose your company from the list!

features.title: Why should you choose our ticket management system?
features.description-responsive: Designed to be mobile-friendly, allowing you to report issues and track your tickets on the go.
features.description-centralized: Centralize all error tickets, making it easy for administrators to manage and resolve them.
features.description-userfriendly: Easy to navigate and use, making it simple for you to create and track your error tickets.

ticket.title: Ticket details
ticket.no-messages-description: Get or send a message and it will show up here.
ticket.subject: Subject

emptystate.no-tickets-description: Create your first ticket and it will show up here.

profile.title: Profile
profile.profile-description: Here you can edit public information about yourself.
profile.logout-description: Thank you for using the app! When you're ready to log out, simply click the Logout button.
profile.name: Name
